allow_server_reboot.description: Allow rebooting of ddcloud_server instances (e.g. for adding / removing NICs)?

cloudcontrol_endpoint.description: The base URL of a custom target end-point for the Dimension Data CloudControl API.

password.description: The password used to authenticate to the Dimension Data CloudControl API (if not specified, then the MCP_PASSWORD environment variable will be used).

region.description: The region code that identifies the target end-point for the Dimension Data CloudControl API.

retry_delay.description: The maximum delay, in seconds, between retries of operations that fail due to a RESOURCE_BUSY response from CloudControl.

retry_timeout.description: The number of seconds before retrying an operation times out.

username.description: The user name used to authenticate to the Dimension Data CloudControl API (if not specified, then the MCP_USER environment variable will be used).

addresslist_name.description: The Name of the address list

begin.description: The address or starting address for an address range

end.description: The end address for an address range

network.description: The base address for an IP network

networkdomain.description: The Id of the network domain in which the address applies

prefix_size.description: The prefix size for an IP network

addresses.description: Simple IP addresses included in the address list

child_lists.description: The Ids of child address lists included in the address list

description.description: A description for the firewall rule

ip_version.description: The IP version (IPv4 or IPv6) used by the address list

name.description: A name for the address list

networkdomain.description: The Id of the network domain in which the address list rule applies

begin.description: The address or starting address for an address range

end.description: The end address for an address range

network.description: The base address for an IP network

prefix_size.description: The prefix size for an IP network

action.description: The action performed by the firewall rule

destination_address.description: The destination IP address to be matched by the rule

destination_address_list.description: The Id of the destination IP address list to be matched by the rule

destination_network.description: The destination IP network to be matched by the rule

destination_port.description: The destination port to be matched by the rule

destination_port_list.description: The Id of the destination port list to be matched by the rule

ip_version.description: The IP version to which the firewall rule applies

name.description: A name for the firewall rule

networkdomain.description: The Id of the network domain to which the firewall rule applies

placement.description: Where in the firewall ACL this particular rule will be created

placement_relative_to.description: When placement is 'before' or 'after', specifies the name of the firewall rule to which the placement instruction refers

protocol.description: The protocol to which the rule applies

source_address.description: The source IP address to be matched by the rule

source_address_list.description: The Id of the source IP address list to be matched by the rule

source_network.description: The source IP network to be matched by the rule

source_port.description: The source port to be matched by the rule

source_port_list.description: The Id of the source port list to be matched by the rule

address_type.description: The reserved IP address type ('ipv4' or 'ipv6').

vlan.description: The Id of the VLAN in which the IP address is reserved.

networkdomain.description: The Id of the network domain that the NAT rule applies to.

ipv4.description: Private IPV4 address for the nic

ipv6.description: Private IPV6 Address for the nic

server.description: ID of the server to which the additional nics needs to be updated

type.description: The type of network adapter (E1000 or VMXNET3)

datacenter.description: The Id of the MCP 2.0 datacenter in which the network domain is created

description.description: A description for the network domain

name.description: A name for the network domain

nat_ipv4_address.description: The IPv4 address for the network domain's IPv6->IPv4 Source Network Address Translation (SNAT). This is the IPv4 address of the network domain's IPv4 egress

outside_transit_ipv4_subnet.description: The IPv4 subnet for transit outside of the network domain

plan.description: The plan (service level) for the network domain (ESSENTIALS or ADVANCED)

type.description: The type of default firewall rule (without the 'CCDefault.' prefix)

child_lists.description: The Ids of child port lists included in the port list

description.description: A description for the firewall rule

name.description: A name for the port list

networkdomain.description: The Id of the network domain in which the port list rule applies

ports.description: Simple ports included in the port list

begin.description: The port (or starting port, for a port range)

end.description: The ending port (for a port range

admin_password.description: The initial administrative password (if applicable) for the deployed server

auto_start.description: Should the server be started automatically once it has been deployed

backup_client_urls.description: Download URLs for the server's backup clients (if any)

backup_enabled.description: Is cloud backup enabled for the server

cores_per_cpu.description: The number of cores per CPU allocated to the server

cpu_count.description: The number of CPUs allocated to the server

cpu_speed.description: The speed (quality-of-service) for CPUs allocated to the server

customer_image_id.description: The Id of the customer (custom) image from which the server is created

customer_image_name.description: The name of the customer (custom) image from which the server is created

dns_primary.description: The IP address of the server's primary DNS server

dns_secondary.description: The IP address of the server's secondary DNS server

image.description: The name or Id of the image from which the server is created

image_type.description: The type of image from which the server is created (default is auto-detect)

memory_gb.description: The amount of memory (in GB) allocated to the server

networkdomain.description: The Id of the network domain in which the server is deployed

os_image_id.description: The Id of the OS (built-in) image from which the server is created

os_image_name.description: The name of the OS (built-in) image from which the server is created

power_state.description: Start or shutdown a server. If set to start upon server creation it will Auto Start the server

primary_adapter_ipv4.description: The IPv4 address for the server's primary network adapter

primary_adapter_ipv6.description: The IPv6 address of the server's primary network adapter

primary_adapter_type.description: The type of the server's primary network adapter (E1000 or VMXNET3)

primary_adapter_vlan.description: The Id of the VLAN to which the server's primary network adapter will be attached (the first available IPv4 address will be allocated)

public_ipv4.description: The server's public IPv4 address (if any)

id.description: The network adapter's identifier in CloudControl

ipv4.description: The IPV4 address associated with the network adapter

ipv6.description: The IPV6 Address associated the network adapter

type.description: The type of network adapter (E1000 or VMXNET3)

vlan.description: VLAN ID of the network adapter

id.description: The CloudControl identifier for the virtual disk (computed when the disk is first created)

scsi_bus_number.description: The SCSI bus number for the disk

scsi_unit_id.description: The SCSI Logical Unit Number (LUN) for the disk

size_gb.description: The size (in GB) of the disk

id.description: The network adapter's identifier in CloudControl

ipv4.description: The IPV4 address associated with the network adapter

ipv6.description: The IPV6 Address associated the network adapter

type.description: The type of network adapter (E1000 or VMXNET3)

vlan.description: VLAN ID of the network adapter

networkdomain.description: The Id of the network domain in which the anti-affinity rule applies.

server1.description: The Id of the first server that the anti-affinity rule relates to.

server1_name.description: The name of the first server that the anti-affinity rule relates to.

server2.description: The Id of the second server that the anti-affinity rule relates to.

server2_name.description: The name of the second server that the anti-affinity rule relates to.

asset_id.description: The server's Cloud Backup asset Id

server.description: The Id of the target server

description.description: A description of the backup client

schedule_policy.description: The name of the backup client's assigned schedule policy

storage_policy.description: The name of the backup client's assigned storage policy

emails.description: If alerts are enabled, the email address to which alerts will be sent

trigger.description: If alerts are enabled, one of 'ON_FAILURE', 'ON_SUCCESS', 'ON_SUCCESS_OR_FAILURE'

description.description: A description of the SSL certificate chain.

name.description: The name of the SSL certificate chain.

networkdomain.description: The Id of the network domain in which the SSL certificate chain will be used for SSL offload.

description.description: A description of the SSL domain certificate.

name.description: The name of the SSL domain certificate.

networkdomain.description: The Id of the network domain in which the SSL domain certificate will be used for SSL offload.

private_key.description: The certificate's private key (in PEM format).

certificate.description: The Id of the SSL domain certificate to use.

chain.description: The Id of the SSL certificate chain to use.

description.description: A description of the SSL-offload profile.

name.description: The name of the SSL-offload profile.

networkdomain.description: The Id of the network domain in which the SSL-offload profile will be create.

data_center.description: Data center where Static Route reside

destination_prefix_size.description: Integer prefix defining the size of the network

next_hop_address.description: Gateway address in the form of an INET gateway, CPNC gateway or an address on an Attached VLAN in the same Network Domain

overwrite_system_default.description: Overwrite existing static route if a matching address space found. This attribute is intended to overwrite system default static route. It will delete matching a system default route if found and create a client static route

adapter_type.description: The type of storage adapter used to represent the controller

server.description: The Id of the server that the controller is attached to

id.description: The CloudControl identifier for the virtual disk (computed when the disk is first created)

scsi_bus_number.description: The SCSI bus number for the disk

scsi_unit_id.description: The SCSI Logical Unit Number (LUN) for the disk

size_gb.description: The size (in GB) of the disk

connection_limit.description: The number of active connections that the node supports

connection_rate_limit.description: The number of connections per second that the node supports

description.description: A description for the VIP node

health_monitor.description: The Name of the VIP node's associated health monitor (if any)

health_monitor_id.description: The Id of the VIP node's associated health monitor (if any)

name.description: A name for the VIP node

networkdomain.description: The Id of the network domain in which the VIP node is created

description.description: A description of the VIP pool

load_balance_method.description: The load-balancing method used by the VIP pool

name.description: A name for the VIP pool

attached_vlan_gateway_addressing.description: A String literal LOW or HIGH.

detached_vlan_gateway_address.description: IPv4 Address representation of the desired IPv4 Gateway.

ipv4_base_address.description: The VLAN's private IPv4 base address.

ipv4_prefix_size.description: The VLAN's private IPv4 prefix length.

networkdomain.description: The Id of the network domain in which the VLAN is deployed.

description.description: A description for the firewall rule

ip_version.description: The IP version (IPv4 or IPv6) used by the address list

name.description: A name for the address list

networkdomain.description: The Id of the network domain in which the address list rule applies

datacenter.description: The Id of the MCP 2.0 datacenter in which the network domain is located

name.description: The name of the network domain

nat_ipv4_address.description: The IPv4 address for the network domain's IPv6->IPv4 Source Network Address Translation (SNAT). This is the IPv4 address of the network domain's IPv4 egress

outside_transit_ipv4_subnet.description: The IPv4 subnet for transit outside of the network domain

plan.description: The plan (service level) for the network domain (ESSENTIALS or ADVANCED)

certificate.description: The (first) certificate in the PFX file

file.description: The name of the PFX file

password.description: The password for the PFX file

private_key.description: The (first) private key in the PFX file

ipv4_base_address.description: The VLAN's private IPv4 base address.

ipv4_prefix_size.description: The VLAN's private IPv4 prefix length.

name.description: The name of the target VLAN

networkdomain.description: The Id of the network domain that contains the target VLAN
